#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

  int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t &oid,
                    const string &k,
                    const string &v){
    /*
    Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format
    for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    */
    /* your code here */
    // std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    if(op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end()){
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    uint64_t index, term;
    shared_ptr<Marshallable> m = static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    bool ret = GetRaftServer().Start(m, &index, &term);
    if (!ret){
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    int timeout = 1000000;
    while(timeout){
      if (op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end() && op_id_map_[to_string(oid)]){
        // Log_info("Put %s %s", k.c_str(), kv_store_[k].c_str());
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
      Coroutine::Sleep(100000);
      timeout -= 100000;
    }
    // Log_info("Put timeout");
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t &oid,
                       const string &k,
                       const string &v)
  {
    /* your code here */
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    if(op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end()){
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    uint64_t index, term;
    shared_ptr<Marshallable> m = static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    // Log_info("Send append");
    bool ret = GetRaftServer().Start(m, &index, &term);
    if (!ret){
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
   int timeout = 1000000;
    while(timeout){
      if (op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end() && op_id_map_[to_string(oid)]){
        // Log_info("Put %s %s", k.c_str(), kv_store_[k].c_str());
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
      Coroutine::Sleep(100000);
      timeout -= 100000;
    }
    // Log_info("Append timeout");
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t &oid,
                    const string &k,
                    string *v)
  {
    /* your code here */
    // std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    if(op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end()){
      // *v = get_map_[k];
      *v = kv_store_[k];
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back("");
    uint64_t index, term;
    shared_ptr<Marshallable> m = static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    bool ret = GetRaftServer().Start(m, &index, &term);
    if (!ret){
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    int timeout = 1000000;
    while(timeout){
      if (op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end() && op_id_map_[to_string(oid)]){
        // Log_info("Put %s %s", k.c_str(), kv_store_[k].c_str());
        *v = kv_store_[k];
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
      Coroutine::Sleep(100000);
      timeout -= 100000;
    }
    // Log_info("Get timeout");
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable &m){
    auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable *)(&m);
    /* your code here */
    // std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
    if(op_id_map_.find(v->data_[0]) != op_id_map_.end()){
      return;
    }


    if (v->data_[1] == "put"){
      kv_store_[v->data_[2]] = v->data_[3];
      // Log_info("Put new for key - %s %s", v->data_[2].c_str(), kv_store_[v->data_[2]].c_str());
    }
    else if (v->data_[1] == "append"){
      // Log_info("Append existing for key - %lu %s %s", GetRaftServer().loc_id_, v->data_[2].c_str(), kv_store_[v->data_[2]].c_str());
      kv_store_[v->data_[2]] += v->data_[3];
    }
  
    // else{
    //   string value;
    //   if(kv_store_.find(v->data_[2]) != kv_store_.end()){
    //     value = kv_store_[v->data_[2]];
    //   }
    //   get_map_[v->data_[2]] = value;
    // }
    op_id_map_[v->data_[0]] = true;
  }

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
